column5: Not only numbers, but size too! Any idea's on where this spot might be? I'm guessing NWT?  http://www.worldfishingnetwork.com/videos/channels/members/the-best-ice-fishing-on-earth-70026.aspx
Looks like Lake Scugog.  If he keeps using his spinning rod upside down it's going to blow up.
That's the way to ice fish for big lakers..  Downrigging rods and big reels, get those fish up and back in the water.  I'm guessing NWT for sure.
I'd bet it's a fiberglass rod, so I doubt anything will happen to it.  These videos are really making me hate this weather!
It's Cold Lake Alberta. I love this vid. There's a part 2 as well.
"you wanna try for that double header" I never thought you could TRY for one!
That is a right handed person using a "right" handed reel. Awkward.  Looks like fun.
Wow!  If Ice fishing were like that here even I would do it.
"Not only numbers, but size too! Any idea's on where this spot might be? I'm guessing NWT?"  Imagine putting on the net where that was??? that ice would be swiss cheese
WOW now thats awesome ice fishing right there!
Great video.  Those were absolute tanks.
man that was crazy. For the first few seconds I thought the guy was standing at the edge of the ice fishing into open water!
If only the ice on my lake was frozen
